name: Blink Dagger
description: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Instantly teleports the wielder towards the targeted point.
notes: When targeting a point within 1200 distance, teleports directly onto the targeted point
When targeting a point beyond 1200 distance, teleports 1200 distance towards the targeted point instead
Incoming projectiles are disjointed upon teleporting
Taking more than 0 damage from any other player or Roshan (after reductions and not flagged as HP Removal) puts the item on a fixed cooldown
Cannot be reset with cooldown reset sources
Doubletap targets a point in front of the team's Fountain
Shares cooldown with other blink items

additionalInfo: Taking damage puts the item on a 3-second mute duration
The item mute component has precedence over all damage manipulation sources
trivia: This item is based on Kelen's Dagger of Escape from Warcraft 3
In DotA, the item was originally named Kelen's Dagger of Escape. Kelen is a rogue from World of Warcraft
Later on, it was shortened to just Kelen's Dagger, because most plays used it aggressively, rather than to escape
In Dota 2, it was renamed to Blink Dagger, to avoid copyright issues with Blizzard Entertainment
Riki and Lion are the only heroes who are missing responses for acquiring a Blink Dagger
Axe's cosmetic item, Little Blink Dagger, is based on Blink Dagger

recentChanges.description: Blink no longer clamps its distance to 4/5 of max distance when targeted beyond the max distance
The item mute component now has precedence over all damage manipulation sources
CHANGED Blink from applying a 3-second damage downtime to a 3-second item mute duration
